contents:
除了加州，还有Texas, Oregon, Alaska, .... 這裏有個清單

幾乎每年都有州的提案要獨立, Texas 貌似也算是積極分子。

可惜僅有當地州分的民意還不夠。Texas v. White, 74 U.S. (7 Wall.) 700 (1869) 的判決就提到

the court ruled that, legally speaking, Texas had remained a United States state ever since it first joined the Union, despite its joining the Confederate States of America and its being under military rule at the time of the decision in the case. In deciding the merits of the bond issue, the court further held that the Constitution did not permit states to unilaterally secede from the United States, and that the ordinances of secession, and all the acts of the legislatures within seceding states intended to give effect to such ordinances, were "absolutely null"


The obligations of the State, as a member of the Union, and of every citizen of the State, as a citizen of the United States, remained perfect and unimpaired. It certainly follows that the State did not cease to be a State, nor her citizens to be citizens of the Union. If this were otherwise, the State must have become foreign, and her citizens foreigners. The war must have ceased to be a war for the suppression of rebellion, and must have become a war for conquest and subjugation


説白了，除了成功的武裝革命，就得參衆2院修改憲法，也就是全美國人同意，單個州才能獨立。

如果全體美國人過半數或者大比數同意某個州獨立，我贊成尊重民意
